item.title: Leaf tsunami, 13th December
item.description:
Leaves are everywhere. There’s no pavement left. Safety hazard, as it gets so slippery. Not sure why we pay council tax when the streets look this bad
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 4-62, Weighton Road, Anerley, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street cleansing request – compacted leaves (Wheathill Road, outside 1–4 Byron Close), 13th December
item.description:
Please arrange street sweeping/leaf clearance on Wheathill Road, directly outside 1–4 Byron Close, where compacted leaves and debris have built up along the kerb. Photo attached.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wheathill Road, Anerley, Greater London

item.title: Parking issue, 13th December
item.description:
Currently cars can park on the corner of St James’s Avenue and Cromwell Road and this prevents large vehicles turning into St James’s Avenue (Lorries-Fire Engines and even some smaller vehicles). It needs double yellow lines in place, I feel this could be dangerous as well, I have seen people trying to cross the road there and can not see round the cars or vans parked right on the corners. Look forward to hearing from you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): St James's Avenue, Elmers End, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
